column1: Table 3a. Qatar: Summary of Central Government Finance, 2014–24
(Billions of Qatari Riyals unless otherwise noted)
Est.      Proj.      Proj.      Proj.      Proj.      Proj.      Proj.
Estimated financial net worth of general government 5/       546.7     568.7     867.1     961.3    939.0     970.3     1,067.9    1,163.5    1,253.3    1,350.2    1,453.5
Sources: Ministry of Economy and Finance; and IMF staff estimates and projections.
1/ GFSM 2001 based on staff estimates; presented on a calendar year basis. In 2015, budget will be based on a 9-month period (April-December).
2/ Nonhydrocarbon balance of central government (excluding the portion of investment income and corporate income tax from hydrocarbon activities).
3/ Excludes government deposits with resident banks.
4/ Central government balance plus estimated QIA investment income, excluding capital gains.
5/ Net debt of central government plus the estimated stock of QIA assets.
6/ Include corporate income taxes and investment income from hydrocarbon activities.
